Title: Conjurer
Description: Illusions, traps, minions -- you boldly tap into the arcana to summon something from nothing.

Title: Enchanter
Description: Use the arcane to bring life to the mundane by bewitching, empowering, and ensorcelling.

Title: Warlock
Description: You yield the arcane like a soldier wields a sword: with both force and destructive grace.

Title: Philosopher
Description: You seek to further understand the secrets of the universe, and to pass those insights on

Title: Tactician
Description: The mechanics of the battlefield are your expertise. Use cunning and strategy to lead your soldiers to victory.

Title: Pioneer
Description: You trailblaze through the wilds, helping your people to overcome dangers both natural and man-made.

Title: Druid
Description: You live your life as a rogue and outsider -- one with an uncommon bond with nature, even using it to change your form.

Title: Bard
Description: With word, song, and theater, you both entertain and inspire those around you.

Title: Rogue
Description: You use cunning, finesse, and treachery to take manipulate your surroundings to your advantage.

Title: Soldier
Description: Discipline and strength make you a destructive force on the battlefield, and a leader off it.

Title: Knight
Description: Using your might and virtue, you fight for your noble cause with relentless zeal.

Title: Barbarian
Description: Where other fighters restrain themselves in the name of honor, you bring a terrifying frenzy and bloodlust.
